text: Anthony Edward Jones (May 24, 1966 â€“ January 22, 2021) was an American football offensive tackle in the National Football League. His career lasted from 1988 to 2000. He was a two-time Super Bowl champion winning in 1998 and 1999. He was born in Royston, Georgia. Jones played for the Cleveland Browns, Baltimore Ravens and Denver Broncos. Jones died on January 22, 2021, at the age of 54. ==References== ==Other websites== *NFL.com player page Category:1966 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American football offensive tackles Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:Denver Broncos players Category:Sportspeople from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Tony Jones (offensive tackle)
